body.name: Gotham Steel Hammered 12 Inch Non Stick Frying Pan with Lid – Copper Nonstick Frying Pan, Premium Ceramic Cookware with Stay Cool Handles and Induction Plate for Even Heating, Dishwasher/Oven Safe
body.merchantInfo: Sold by REAL CO USA and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: GOTHAM STEEL HAMMERED COPPER FRYING PAN – Where elegance meets practicality, this frying pan is adorned with a sleek, hammered copper exterior and features a triple coated nonstick ceramic surface ensuring the ultimate food release – the food slides right off. Beyond its aesthetic, the Gotham Steel hammered copper pan offers a large range of cooking benefits. Its scratch-resistant surface ensures long-lasting durability, even with daily use. And when your cooking is complete, you can simply toss it in the dishwasher for easy cleaning.

ULTIMATE CERAMIC NONSTICK: The Gotham Steel hammered pan features Gotham Steel Ti-Cerma technology which combines super slick ceramic with super strong titanium to provide you with the perfect blend of nonstick and durability. The super smooth ceramic surface ensures the food slides right off, no seasoning or even oil or butter needed. Try it all, from whipping up pancakes to searing steaks and sautéing vegetables, you will get the same result, nothing sticks to the pan!

HASSLE FREE CLEANUPS- The Gotham Steel nonstick pan is designed for effortless cleanups. The slick ceramic surface ensures that with a quick wipe down the leftover food comes right off. All Gotham Steel cookware is 100% dishwasher safe so you can simply place the pan in the dishwasher for a quick and hassle-free cleanup. Here at Gotham Steel, we understand that you want to spend less time cleaning and more time cooking.

EVENLY COOKED FOOD: The Gotham Steel nonstick pan is pressed from a solid sheet of aluminum and then spiralized, ensuring there are no dead zones or hot spots, providing deliciously and perfectly cooked foods day in and day out.

SAFE & COMFORTABLE HANDLES- The Gotham Steel pans stainless steel handles are designed with safety and comfort in mind. They stay cool to the touch even under high heat, and their unique Y-shaped design allows heat to escape, ensuring a secure and comfortable grip during cooking.

HEALTHIER FOODS & ECO-FRIENDLY COOKING- All Gotham Steel products are non-toxic and chemical-free. The hammered pan’s nonstick coating is composed of ceramic and reinforced with titanium, ensuring that it is free of harmful substances such as PFOA, PFOS, lead, and cadmium. This makes Gotham Steel a safe, eco-friendly and healthy option for cooking and preparing meals for your family.
STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE: The Gotham Steel ceramic nonstick pan is compatible with gas, electric, glass cooktops & oven safe up to a sizzling up to 500° Fahrenheit, lid included!
10 YEAR GUARANTEE: With Customers in mind, The Gotham Steel hammered copper nonstick pan is constructed to provide years of outstanding usage and is backed by a 10-year limited guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great & Beautiful Hammered Copper on the outside Skillet!
reviews.reviewText: Love it! This Glass Lid Is A Must To Have! Cleans like a dream.. perfect size IMO… Would order again, in a heartbeat! My Favorite Skillet EVER!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product, even heat, easily cleaned. However the handle on the lid gets quite hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have an induction stove- this works great! Non-stick and easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great pan for the money! Cooks evenly on my gas stove. Nice exterior and lid. Nothing sticks to it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great skillet until after a few months, still is good, just not great.
reviews.reviewText: Update: I was in love with this skillet. After using it a few months, its lost it's non stick performance. I have been extra careful to not use high heat. I always use silicone and non metal utensils when using any of my pots and pans. It has a bad scratch on it and honestly no idea where. I have re-seasoned it as the instructions said that came with it, it helps for one or two uses. I've cleaned it per the recommended way.Depending on where you read, it says to use spray if it starts cooking, yet other sites on the gotham preach not to use spray. So it can get confusing. Overall, still a good skillet. You do get a phenomenal deal within the box when you order to get pot pan or a smaller skillet for great price. That kind of evens it out and makes them worth it overall. Still a gorgeous skillet.I got the hammered skillet. It’s a beautiful skillet. Use it almost every day since I’ve received it and it’s performed flawlessly. I was they type that used high heat all the time and cooking sprays. So far medium heat and no sprays is working out great. Time will tell. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this pan nothing sticks, cleans easy, got one for my daughter in law she loves hers too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for one-pot meals
reviews.reviewText: I coat the pan with olive oil, put chicken, turkey, etc in the pan, surround it with root vegetables, and then bake them in the oven. When the meat is done, I set it aside in a warming dish. I boil down the meat juices on the stove burner and then brown the veggies. That's where the non-stick coating comes in handy. It's a very tasty and complete meal that will feed 3-4 people. It's very simple to make. The pan has the depth to accommodate a whole chicken or half a turkey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was exactly what I was expecting for!!!!
This is the best frypan I have ever had ,nothing sticks to it and a wipe over to clean,very impressed, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not non stick after 1 month, regret buying it.
reviews.reviewText: It's not worth buying this pan. The nonstick only last for a month. Everytime I cook, food sticks and burns. Waste of money

Have used for a few days now. Treating with kid gloves as I would like it to last but that is wishful thinking. Medium heat only and get the food in before it heats up much. As someone had mentioned it humps up in the middle when it heats up. Probably because of the dissimilar metals built into it. My last non stick (started sticking after about a year) always cooked flat and didn't hump up. But then thinking about it all my bacon grease flows to the outer edge so maybe it's a good thing. The hammered copper looks cool but someone said it's paint after it started coming off in the wash. Whatever. It is what it is.

This pan is rubbish don’t waste your money. The non stick application will come off if you clean it with a green scourer pad like a scotch brite. How else is it suppose to clean. This pan will lead to disappointment if you have any understanding of a quality product.
So good! Just let it warm up nice and hot!
